About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a graduate Student at Arizona State University studying Computer Science. I have completed bachelors studies in computer science from Vellore Institute of Technology, Vellore, India.

Download my resume here

Connect with me on LinkedIn

Software Engineering

Experience : Internship Experience at J.P. Morgan and Courses

  • Created an application to solve the volunteer management problem faced by the NGO CampDiaries using Java Spring Boot framework, React.JS, MySQL, and AWS.
  • Adept in scripting and scraping using Python and selenium. Developed scripts with scrapers to update me
  • Completed Sotware Processes and Agile Practices. Certificate

Deep Learning

Experience : Personal and Academic Projects and Courses

  • Developed supervised (BERT) and unsupervised (k-means, DBSCAN) models to predict the stance of the sentences with respect to a particular topic. Used data augmentation – back-translation, paraphrasers, etc. for data augmentation
  • Developed a technique to predict proteins’ families based on their fasta sequences. Treated the sequences as English sentences. The model yielded over 0.97 test accuracy.
  • Completed the Machine Learning course by Andrew Ng. Certificate
  • Completed the Deep Learning specialization series by Andrew Ng.

Data Science

Experience : Personal and Academic Projects and Courses

  • I am adept in working with data, performing data manipulation, cleaning, engineering and deriving insight from it
  • While working on projects related to machine learning and deep learning I have worked extensively on data engineering to create datasets tailored to my requirements.
